effect.name: Tails7 Polygon Colored Soild (Texture)
effect.description: The shader transforms the texture to give a polygon effect based on points A, B, C, and D also colors the polygon with one selected color. (Mainly intended for Tails7)
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Tails7 Polygon Colored Soild (Texture) | 1.0 (10.01.2026) */
parameter.description: The shader transforms the texture to give a polygon effect based on points A, B, C, and D also colors the polygon with one selected color. (Mainly intended for Tails7)

parameter.name: Reversed screen width
parameter.description: This variable must store (1.0 / Frame Width) to set the error threshold for the X axis so that there are fewer artifacts.

parameter.name: Reversed screen height
parameter.description: This variable must store (1.0 / Frame Height) to set the error threshold for the Y axis so that there are fewer artifacts.

parameter.name: A (Visibility)
parameter.description: This variable must store the visibility information of the object to determine whether point A is behind or in front of the camera.

parameter.name: xA (-X -Y)
parameter.description: X of point A (Top left point)

parameter.name: yA (-X -Y)
parameter.description: Y of point A (Top left point)

parameter.name: B (Visibility)
parameter.description: This variable must store the visibility information of the object to determine whether point B is behind or in front of the camera.

parameter.name: xB (+X -Y)
parameter.description: X of point B (Top right point)

parameter.name: yB (+X -Y)
parameter.description: Y of point B (Top right point)

parameter.name: C (Visibility)
parameter.description: This variable must store the visibility information of the object to determine whether point C is behind or in front of the camera.

parameter.name: xC (+X +Y)
parameter.description: X of point C (Bottom right point)

parameter.name: yC (+X +Y)
parameter.description: Y of point C (Bottom right point)

parameter.name: D (Visibility)
parameter.description: This variable must store the visibility information of the object to determine whether point D is behind or in front of the camera.

parameter.name: xD (-X +Y)
parameter.description: X of point D (Bottom left point)

parameter.name: yD (-X +Y)
parameter.description: Y of point D (Bottom left point)
